ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Familiar Troubles." Caged and imprisoned, Pooka finds himself at the mercy of the fairies he's chased and harassed all his life. Now the tables have finally turned, and it's time for the fairies to have their revenge! Pooka's only hope for rescue is Tarot, but she has been drugged by a poisoned blade and faces death herself.
